name: SOLAR_CLOUDY_DAY
description: Solar PV generation profile for a partly cloudy day with intermittent clouds
notes: Reduced peak generation (70% of clear day) due to cloud cover
Irregular profile with variability representing cloud movement
Overall generation reduced by approximately 30-40% vs clear day
Peak around solar noon (hour 11) but lower and less consistent
Some afternoon dips representing thicker cloud coverage
Normalized to cloudy day peak of 0.7 (70% of clear day irradiance)
Actual generation highly variable depending on cloud density and movement
